name: Balance (itch) (AlexApps2571)
description:
Balance the Ball for as long as you can in this Simple yet Challenging Arcade Style Game.

Balance is a new, one tap / one touch style game where the user mustbalance the ball by tapping either side of the screen. Move too far one way, and you will fall.

Balance is a great game to play with, and challenge your friends and is suitable for all ages!

Try not to fall!

◉ Loads of Ball Styles to be Unlocked
◉ Simple and Clean Graphics and Game play
◉ Easy to use Player Control
